bibl.title: Augustus and Meroe.
bibl.note: The war of Augustus against Meroe and the resulting establishment were in some respects an organic continuation of Ptolemaic policy towards Meroe. - Interpretation of two art objects connected to the person of Augustus and found in Meroe.
bibl.seg: The war of Augustus against Meroe and the resulting establishment were in some respects an organic continuation of Ptolemaic policy towards Meroe. - Interpretation of two art objects connected to the person of Augustus and found in Meroe.
